short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random Anime background on the Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello everyone, thank you for your interest in Amazing Anime Theme.
This is a utility that changes Chrome's theme from the default to a very beautiful anime style.

Every time you open a new tab, the background changes, this will help you stop being bored. For anime fans, this is even more wonderful.
Once the installation is successful, you will not need to do anything. The utility will run automatically and change the theme every time you open a new tab.

Thank you for using it.
